segments.text: I am so glad I caught you at home . I need your help !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cafe au lait , cafe latte , cappuccino , cafe mocha ... I can't keep them all straight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Slow down . What are you talking about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's about a girl . No , an angel ! I'm going to the coffee shop where she works right now .
segments.speaker: S1
